lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Glickman also said that the Export Enhancement Program's, EEP, spending authority of 1.5 billion dlrs is quickly being used up, and Congress will have to decide whether to expand this program while making cuts in other areas.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While not committing himself for or against such action, he said lawmakers have to examine recent government findings which indicate certificates cost more than cash payments.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Speaking at the annual meeting of the National Grain and Feed Association, Glickman said he learned this week from the House budget committee that the agriculture committee will have to reduce the fiscal year 1988 farm budget by up to two billion dlrs from the 30 billion dlrs level already approved.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
